mapper.select: SELECT w.wish_id, w.member_id, w.product_id, w.created_at, p.product_name, p.price, p.image_url FROM wishlist w INNER JOIN product p ON w.product_id = p.product_id WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC

SELECT NVL(SUM(TRUNC(p.price * (CASE WHEN m.member_grade = 'Y' THEN 0.9 ELSE 1 END))),0) FROM wishlist w JOIN product p ON w.product_id = p.product_id JOIN member m ON w.member_id = m.member_id WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId}
